title: Bright, Open and Spacious 2 Bedroom Apt. -- Great Location
posting_body: Spacious two-bedroom apartment with ample storage in the kitchen.
Excellent location on Washington and Martin, walking distance to public transportation and local shopping.
Heat, water, and garbage fees included!!!
Tenant pays electricity.
Off-street, resident-only parking.
Convenient on-site coin laundry room.
1 month rent security deposit.
No misdemeanor, criminal or felony record.
No past evictions; No judgments / unpaid bills.
Stable income - work and rental history required.
Call to be pre-qualify; and we will schedule you to see a unit.
ALL viewings are by appointment ONLY.
$45 application fee and 5 business days to be approved.
No pets please.
Picture is for layout of the apartment and not the exact vacant unit
No text.
2030 Washington St.
Waukegan, IL 60085
1 Block west of Washington and Lewis
